title: Add 'setup <editor>' command for editor integrations
description: Install slash commands, skills, rules for Claude Code, Cursor, Zed, etc.

title: Improve error messages with structured suggestions
description: Errors should include 'suggestion' field with command to fix the issue

title: Add integration tests for Impact Analysis CLI commands
Token-Efficient Output
description: Minimize token usage for agent context windows with --concise flag and minimal field sets

title: Add --concise global flag
description: Add global --concise flag to CLI. Use to_string() instead of to_string_pretty() and reduce fields to essentials.
acceptance_criteria:
- --concise flag available on all commands
- JSON output uses compact format (no pretty printing)
- Reduced field set in output

title: Define minimal field sets per command
description: In concise mode: def outputs {file, line, column} only; symbols outputs {qualified, file, line}; spider outputs {qualified, depth} per node.
acceptance_criteria:
- def concise: only file/line/column
- symbols concise: only qualified/file/line
- spider concise: only qualified/depth per node
- Full output available without --concise

title: Add --fields flag for custom field selection
description: Allow agents to specify exactly which fields they need: --fields file,line,qualified
acceptance_criteria:
- --fields flag parses comma-separated field names
- Only requested fields included in output
- Error message if invalid field name requested

title: Git Provenance Layer
description: Answer 'Who last touched this symbol?' and 'When was this added?' for historical context

title: Add blame command
description: Input: symbol name or file:line. Output: {author, date, commit, message}. Use git blame under the hood. Create crates/rocketindex/src/git.rs module.
acceptance_criteria:
- blame command exists in CLI
- Accepts symbol name or file:line format
- Returns author, date, commit hash, message
- git.rs module created with git operations

title: Add history command
description: Input: symbol name. Output: List of commits that modified this symbol. Uses git log -L for line-based history tracking.
acceptance_criteria:
- history command exists in CLI
- Accepts symbol name
- Returns list of commits with dates and messages
- Handles file renames gracefully

title: Enhance def output with --git flag
description: Add optional last_modified field to def output when --git flag is used. Minimal overhead when not requested.
acceptance_criteria:
- --git flag available on def command
- Adds last_modified object with author/date/commit
- No performance impact when flag not used

title: Add 'doctor' command for health checks
description: Check index health, staleness, parse errors. Output actionable suggestions in JSON for agent self-healing

title: Reverse Spider - Impact Analysis
description: Enable agents to understand regression risk by answering 'What calls this symbol?' via reverse dependency traversal

title: Add reverse_spider function to spider module
description: Implement reverse_spider() in crates/rocketindex/src/spider.rs. Use existing find_references() from CodeIndex. Same BFS algorithm but follow references TO the symbol instead of FROM.
acceptance_criteria:
- reverse_spider() function exists in spider.rs
- Uses BFS traversal like forward spider
- Follows references TO symbols (callers)
- Returns SpiderResult with nodes and unresolved

title: Add --reverse flag to spider CLI
description: Add --reverse flag to spider command in CLI. When set, use reverse_spider() instead of spider(). Output same JSON structure.
acceptance_criteria:
- --reverse flag available on spider command
- Calls reverse_spider() when flag is set
- JSON output has same structure (nodes + unresolved)

title: Add callers command for single-level lookup
description: Simpler single-level 'who calls X?' query. Complements deep spider for quick lookups. rocketindex callers MyModule.myFunction
acceptance_criteria:
- callers command exists in CLI
- Returns direct callers only (depth 1)
- JSON output: array of caller symbols with locations

title: Rename 'build' command to 'index'
description: More accurate terminology - we're creating an index, not building a binary

title: Fuzzy Error Recovery
description: Help agents recover from typos with structured 'Did you mean?' suggestions in machine-parseable format

title: Add Levenshtein distance utility
description: Create crates/rocketindex/src/fuzzy.rs with edit distance calculation. Consider using strsim crate vs in-house implementation.
acceptance_criteria:
- fuzzy.rs module exists and is exported from lib.rs
- Levenshtein distance function works correctly
- Unit tests for distance calculation

title: Enhance def command error response with suggestions
description: On NOT_FOUND, search for similar symbols and return top 3-5 suggestions by edit distance. JSON format: {"error": "Symbol not found", "suggestions": ["X", "Y"]}
acceptance_criteria:
- def command returns suggestions array on NOT_FOUND
- Suggestions sorted by edit distance (closest first)
- Maximum 5 suggestions returned
- Works with both JSON and text output modes

title: Add fuzzy search flag to symbols command
description: New flag: --fuzzy or --approximate. Return matches within edit distance threshold.
acceptance_criteria:
- --fuzzy flag added to symbols command
- Fuzzy matches returned even without exact pattern match
- Edit distance threshold configurable or sensible default
